text: Mata ware wa musa ni (rippo o sazukeru kikan to shite) 30 yoru o yakusoku shitaga, sarani 10 (yoru) o kuwaeta. Sorede omo ga sadame rareta kigen wa 40 yoru to natta. Musa wa, kyodai no harun ni itta. `Anata wa watashi ni kawatte hitobito o tochi shi nasai. Tadashiku kodo shi, aku o okonau mono no michi ni shitagatte wa naranai
